The CellServiceApp was developed during the \"Internet of Services Lab\" master project WS16/17 at Service-centric Networking, Department of Telecommunication Systems, Technical University Berlin. Visualization of most visited places require resource intensive calculations. Please run them manually by clicking the below \"Most visited places\" button. Refresh location history data by clicking \"location history\".
